bwwExcerpt: The revival, starring Hugh Jackman and Sutton Foster, and featuring a large cast and orchestra, plus splashy sets and costumes and dance choreography, is by no means a train wreck. (It is certain to bring pleasure to many theatergoers - and some of them might even be glad they spent hundreds of dollars on premium-priced tickets.)
